message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I can do $125, which is a bit of a compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $125. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $115. I can do $128, which is my best offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options
I'm getting close to your best offer, but I'm still a bit above $128. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?
